subject: Baseball
World Series
lead_paragraph: Tim Lincecum has performed even better in relief than he did as a starter in 2010, when he went 2-0 in the World Series and 4-1 in postseason.
snippet: Tim Lincecum has performed even better in relief than he did as a starter in 2010, when he went 2-0 in the World Series and 4-1 in postseason.
